name: One Nite @ Scorpz
description:
SPOOKY SPOOKY SPOOKY!!!! AHHH!!! LATE ENTRY 4 DA SPOOKY SCOOPY SCORPY JAM!!!!

SURVIVE DA NITE IN DA HOUSE OF KILLERS. TRY UR LUCK........BE SMART AND U MAY JUST SURVIVE!!!!!

Controls:

Click on da cameras to change camera.

Right Click on da currently open camera to close the cameras.

Click on da buttons to open and close da doors.
